name: Pokemon GO SMS Service
description: Service to search for Pokemon around you using Pokevision.

PGO_USERNAME.description: Pokemon GO username or Google account

PGO_PASSWORD.description: Pokemon GO password or Google password

PGO_PROVIDER.description: Login provider. Google ('google') or Pokemon Trainer Club ('ptc')

POKEMON_FILTER.description: List of Pokemon that you don't want to see.
